title: Tech News: AOL and Yahoo Might Get Sold Again
itunes:title: Tech News: AOL and Yahoo Might Get Sold Again
description:
Verizon is looking to offload AOL and Yahoo (for about half of what the company paid for them). Facebook hates Apple's new iOS rules. Sony hates crossplay. And Jonathan hates thunderstorms.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
